title: Third Continent
body:
Do any you have the link to where Riot confirm about the third continent? 

Shajro halp plz.

replies.body:
This is why we still don't have a map!

Damn it Ez!

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=eaG99frg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-05T02:18:14.358+0000)
>
> I can confirm that we have confirmed three continents.
> 
> Does that help? :D
>

LIES, THERE ARE FIVE CONTINENTS

I can neither confirm nor deny that.  >_>

http://i.imgur.com/BQlZrMp.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=Ebonmaw Dragon,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=eaG99frg,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-10-05T02:43:43.455+0000)
>
> LIES, THERE ARE FIVE CONTINENTS
> 
> https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/5/53/5_continents.PNG

7 including antartica 5 oceans

Depends on the contient model.
Some regions count asia and europe as one,some differentiate between NA and SA,then there is antarctica and scientifically India could also be considered its own contient...

So yeah there are really no clear definitions of what is considered a continent.
Wrong, Greenland is it's own continent
I keep forgetting, what are the three again? I also know we have islands.

As far as I remember the continents go like this:

- **Valoran** - Demacia, Noxus, Freljord, Mount Targon, Piltover, Zaun

- **Ionia** - All of its provinces

- **Southern Continent** - Shurima, Icathia

- **Various Islands (Not a continent but whatever)** - Serpent Isles and Shadow Isles

Said southern continent has yet to be named in any outwardly facing lore.

Sod if I know where the Kumungu is.
